column4: hey guys. i have installed the firestarter firewall... but now i can't open the gtk window anymore (since I enabled the firewall)... is it blocking root's access to the X server so i cant open the firestarter window with sudo?
Xlib: connection to ":0.0" refused by server
are you trying to start firestarter from the command prompt?
i just tried from the Administration menu... no luck
